content:
This came up on today's call, but mostly just as an aside wrt passing a list of patients to export.
@Dan Gottlieb would you like me to create a JIRA and/or GitHub issue for adding some verbiage about invoking this operation via POST?
Thanks Lee - agree that it's worth tracking separately from the group membership issue. Can you open it on Github since we'll address it as part of the Argonaut work?
